pma:database.name: scolaricx
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `apprenant` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `matricule_apprenant` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `code_classe` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `nom_apprenant` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `prenom_apprenant` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `telephone` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `adresse` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `contact_parentale` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `information_tierce` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `pssw` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`matricule_apprenant`,`matricule_etablissement`,`date_academique`) USING BTREE, KEY `id` (`id`), KEY `code_classe` (`code_classe`), CONSTRAINT `apprenant_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`code_classe`) REFERENCES `classe` (`code_classe`) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `calendrier` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code_classe` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `code_discipline` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `jour` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `horaire` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `week` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `lieu` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `code_classe` (`code_classe`), KEY `code_discipline` (`code_discipline`), KEY `date_academique` (`date_academique`), CONSTRAINT `calendrier_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`code_classe`) REFERENCES `classe` (`code_classe`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `calendrier_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`code_discipline`) REFERENCES `discipline` (`code_discipline`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `classe` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code_classe` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `id_niveau` int(250) DEFAULT NULL, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `nom_classe` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `scolarite` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `ini` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `pssw` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`code_classe`) USING BTREE, KEY `id` (`id`) USING BTREE, KEY `classe_ibfk_1` (`id_niveau`), CONSTRAINT `classe_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`id_niveau`) REFERENCES `niveau` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `cldallow` ( `CODE_FOLDER` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `CODE_FILE` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `CODE_CLOUD` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `CODE_ALLOW` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `READ_` smallint(6) NOT NULL, `WRITE_` smallint(6) NOT NULL, `CREATE_` smallint(6) NOT NULL, `DELETE_` smallint(6) NOT NULL, `SHARE_` smallint(1) NOT NULL, `DOWNLOAD_` smallint(1) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`CODE_ALLOW`), UNIQUE KEY `CODE_FOLDER` (`CODE_FOLDER`), UNIQUE KEY `CODE_FILE` (`CODE_FILE`), UNIQUE KEY `CODE_CLOUD` (`CODE_CLOUD`), KEY `ID` (`ID`), KEY `ID_all` (`ID`), KEY `I_FK_ALLOW_FOLDER` (`CODE_FOLDER`), KEY `I_FK_ALLOW_FILE` (`CODE_FILE`), KEY `I_FK_ALLOW_CLOUD` (`CODE_CLOUD`), CONSTRAINT `FK_ALLOW_FILE` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_FILE`) REFERENCES `cldfile` (`CODE_FILE`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `FK_ALLOW_FOLDER` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_FOLDER`) REFERENCES `cldfolder` (`CODE_FOLDER`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `cldallow_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_CLOUD`) REFERENCES `cldcloud` (`CODE_CLOUD`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=33 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `cldchat` ( `ID_CHAT` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `CODE_CLOUD` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `CODE_USER` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `S_DATE` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `CONTENT` text NOT NULL, `FILE_PATH` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID_CHAT`), KEY `ID_CHAT` (`ID_CHAT`), KEY `I_FK_CHAT_CLOUD` (`CODE_CLOUD`), KEY `I_FK_CHAT_USER` (`CODE_USER`), CONSTRAINT `FK_CHAT_CLOUD` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_CLOUD`) REFERENCES `cldcloud` (`CODE_CLOUD`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `cldchat_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_USER`) REFERENCES `clduser_` (`CODE_USER`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `cldcloud` ( `CODE_USER` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `CODE_CLOUD` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `NAME` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `PSSW` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `C_DATE` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `TYPE` smallint(6) NOT NULL, `MATRICULE_ETABLISSEMENT` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`CODE_CLOUD`), KEY `ID` (`ID`), KEY `ID_cl` (`ID`), KEY `I_FK_CLOUD_USER` (`CODE_USER`), CONSTRAINT `cldcloud_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_USER`) REFERENCES `clduser_` (`CODE_USER`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `clddelete_ff` ( `CODE_FILE` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `CODE_USER` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `CODE_FOLDER` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `DATE` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`CODE_FILE`,`CODE_USER`,`CODE_FOLDER`), KEY `I_FK_DELETE_FF_FILE` (`CODE_FILE`), KEY `I_FK_DELETE_FF_USER` (`CODE_USER`), KEY `I_FK_DELETE_FF_FOLDER` (`CODE_FOLDER`), CONSTRAINT `clddelete_ff_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_FILE`) REFERENCES `cldfile` (`CODE_FILE`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `clddelete_ff_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_FOLDER`) REFERENCES `cldfolder` (`CODE_FOLDER`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `clddelete_ff_ibfk_3` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_USER`) REFERENCES `clduser_` (`CODE_USER`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `cldfile` ( `CODE_USER` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `CODE_FOLDER` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `CODE_CLOUD` varchar(255) DEFAULT 'null', `ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `CODE_FILE` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `NAME` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `SIZE` float NOT NULL, `STATUT` smallint(6) NOT NULL, `ICON` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `PATH_` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `VIEW` int(255) NOT NULL, `LAST_VIEW` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `LAST_WHO` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `C_DATE` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` text DEFAULT 'Any description ', PRIMARY KEY (`CODE_FILE`), KEY `ID` (`ID`), KEY `I_FK_FILE_USER` (`CODE_USER`), KEY `I_FK_FILE_FOLDER` (`CODE_FOLDER`), KEY `LAST_WHO` (`LAST_WHO`), KEY `CODE_CLOUD` (`CODE_CLOUD`), CONSTRAINT `FK_FILE_FOLDER` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_FOLDER`) REFERENCES `cldfolder` (`CODE_FOLDER`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `cldfile_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_USER`) REFERENCES `clduser_` (`CODE_USER`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `cldfile_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`LAST_WHO`) REFERENCES `clduser_` (`CODE_USER`) ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `cldfile_ibfk_3` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_CLOUD`) REFERENCES `cldcloud` (`CODE_CLOUD`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `cldfolder` ( `CODE_LIB` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `CODE_CLOUD` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `CODE_USER` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `CODE_FOLDER_MANY_FOLDER_WITHIN` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `CODE_FOLDER` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `NAME` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `C_DATE` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `DESCRIPTION` text DEFAULT NULL, `STATUT` smallint(6) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`CODE_FOLDER`), KEY `ID` (`ID`), KEY `ID_f` (`ID`), KEY `I_FK_FOLDER_LIB` (`CODE_LIB`), KEY `I_FK_FOLDER_CLOUD` (`CODE_CLOUD`), KEY `I_FK_FOLDER_USER` (`CODE_USER`), KEY `CODE_FOLDER_MANY_FOLDER_WITHIN` (`CODE_FOLDER_MANY_FOLDER_WITHIN`), CONSTRAINT `FK_FOLDER_CLOUD` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_CLOUD`) REFERENCES `cldcloud` (`CODE_CLOUD`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `FK_FOLDER_LIB` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_LIB`) REFERENCES `cldlib` (`CODE_LIB`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `cldfolder_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_FOLDER_MANY_FOLDER_WITHIN`) REFERENCES `cldfolder` (`CODE_FOLDER`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `cldfolder_ibfk_3` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_USER`) REFERENCES `clduser_` (`CODE_USER`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=33 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `cldlib` ( `CODE_USER` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `CODE_LIB` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `NAME` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`CODE_LIB`), KEY `ID` (`ID`), KEY `ID_lib` (`ID`), KEY `I_FK_LIB_USER` (`CODE_USER`), CONSTRAINT `cldlib_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_USER`) REFERENCES `clduser_` (`CODE_USER`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `cldnotif` ( `ID_NOTIF` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `CODE_USER` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `CODE_CLOUD` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `LIBELLE` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `C_DATE` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `MSG` text DEFAULT NULL, `TYPE` smallint(6) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID_NOTIF`), KEY `ID_NOTIF` (`ID_NOTIF`), KEY `I_FK_NOTIF_USER` (`CODE_USER`), KEY `I_FK_NOTIF_CLOUD` (`CODE_CLOUD`), CONSTRAINT `FK_NOTIF_CLOUD` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_CLOUD`) REFERENCES `cldcloud` (`CODE_CLOUD`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `cldnotif_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_USER`) REFERENCES `clduser_` (`CODE_USER`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `clduser_` ( `ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `CODE_USER` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `F_NAME` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `L_NAME` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `PSSW` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `PSSW_R` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ROLE` int(11) NOT NULL, `MATRICULE_ETABLISSEMENT` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`CODE_USER`), KEY `ID` (`ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `clduser_part_of_cloud` ( `CODE_USER` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `CODE_CLOUD` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `ROLE` int(1) NOT NULL, `BANNED` int(1) NOT NULL, `LAST_VIEW` varchar(128) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`CODE_USER`,`CODE_CLOUD`), KEY `I_FK_USER_PART_OF_CLOUD_USER` (`CODE_USER`), KEY `I_FK_USER_PART_OF_CLOUD_CLOUD` (`CODE_CLOUD`), CONSTRAINT `clduser_part_of_cloud_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_CLOUD`) REFERENCES `cldcloud` (`CODE_CLOUD`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `clduser_part_of_cloud_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`CODE_USER`) REFERENCES `clduser_` (`CODE_USER`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `compta` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `id_tranche` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `matricule_apprenant` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `code_classe` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `montant` int(250) NOT NULL, `date_paiement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `nom_validateur` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `matricule_apprenant` (`matricule_apprenant`), KEY `code_classe` (`code_classe`), KEY `compta_ibfk_3` (`id_tranche`), CONSTRAINT `compta_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`code_classe`) REFERENCES `classe` (`code_classe`) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `compta_ibfk_3` FOREIGN KEY (`id_tranche`) REFERENCES `tranche_paiement` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, CONSTRAINT `compta_ibfk_4` FOREIGN KEY (`matricule_apprenant`) REFERENCES `apprenant` (`matricule_apprenant`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `discipline` ( `id` int(250) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code_discipline` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `code_matiere` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `nom_discipline` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`code_discipline`) USING BTREE, KEY `id` (`id`), KEY `code_matiere` (`code_matiere`), CONSTRAINT `discipline_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`code_matiere`) REFERENCES `matiere` (`code_matiere`) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `discipline_classe` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code_discipline` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `code_classe` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `matricule_enseignant` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `heure` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE KEY `code_discipline` (`code_discipline`,`code_classe`), KEY `code_classe` (`code_classe`), KEY `matricule_enseignant` (`matricule_enseignant`), CONSTRAINT `discipline_classe_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`code_classe`) REFERENCES `classe` (`code_classe`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `discipline_classe_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`code_discipline`) REFERENCES `discipline` (`code_discipline`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `discipline_classe_ibfk_3` FOREIGN KEY (`matricule_enseignant`) REFERENCES `enseignant` (`matricule_enseignant`) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `enseignant` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `matricule_enseignant` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `nom_enseignant` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `prenom_enseignant` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `telephone` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `email` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `adresse` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `disponibilite` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `pass` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`matricule_enseignant`,`matricule_etablissement`,`date_academique`) USING BTREE, KEY `id` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `etablissement` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `nom_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `logo` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `date_creation` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `statut` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`matricule_etablissement`,`date_academique`), KEY `id` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `examen` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code_examen` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `nom_examen` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `periode` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `note_valid` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`code_examen`,`id`) USING BTREE, KEY `id` (`id`), KEY `date_academique` (`date_academique`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `matiere` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code_matiere` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `nom_matiere` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`code_matiere`,`matricule_etablissement`,`date_academique`) USING BTREE, KEY `id` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `niveau` ( `id` int(250) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `nom_niveau` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`matricule_etablissement`,`date_academique`) USING BTREE, KEY `matricule_etablissement` (`matricule_etablissement`,`date_academique`), CONSTRAINT `niveau_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`matricule_etablissement`, `date_academique`) REFERENCES `etablissement` (`matricule_etablissement`, `date_academique`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `note` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code_discipline` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `note` double NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `code_examen` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `matricule_apprenant` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `date_academique` (`date_academique`), KEY `note_ibfk_1` (`code_examen`), KEY `note_ibfk_2` (`matricule_apprenant`), KEY `code_discipline` (`code_discipline`), CONSTRAINT `note_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`code_examen`) REFERENCES `examen` (`code_examen`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `note_ibfk_3` FOREIGN KEY (`code_discipline`) REFERENCES `discipline` (`code_discipline`) ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `note_ibfk_4` FOREIGN KEY (`matricule_apprenant`) REFERENCES `apprenant` (`matricule_apprenant`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `operation` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `matricule_utilisateur` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `libelle` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_operation` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `salle` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nom_salle` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`nom_salle`), KEY `index` (`id`), KEY `matricule_etablissement` (`matricule_etablissement`), KEY `date_academique` (`date_academique`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `tranche_paiement` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `code_classe` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `matricule_etablissement` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `date_academique` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `montant` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `echeance` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `nom_tranche` varchar(250) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `code_classe` (`code_classe`), KEY `date_academique` (`date_academique`), CONSTRAINT `tranche_paiement_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`code_classe`) REFERENCES `classe` (`code_classe`) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE `utilisateur` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `matricule_utlisateur` text NOT NULL, `nom_utilisateur` text NOT NULL, `prenom_utilisateur` text NOT NULL, `email_utilisateur` text NOT NULL, `telephone_utilisateur` text DEFAULT NULL, `pssw` text NOT NULL, `role` text NOT NULL, `matricule_etablissement` text DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`matricule_utlisateur`(250),`pssw`(250)) USING BTREE, UNIQUE KEY `email_utilisateur` (`email_utilisateur`) USING HASH, KEY `id` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
